nodes.text: The Thyferran Home Defense Corps uniform was the official uniform worn by Thyferran Home Defense Corps officers.

In 7.5 ABY, during the Bacta War, an Ashern strike team infiltrated General Aerin Dlarit's estate. The strike team found Dlarit asleep on his office chair wearing his finest Thyferran Home Defense Corps uniform. As a way to destabilize the regime of former Director of Imperial Intelligence Ysanne Isard's on the planet Thyferra, the strike team stripped Dlarit of his uniform and circulated a hologram of the deed, causing the Thyferran Home Defense Corps officers to be treated with scorn by their fellow Imperials.
